name: Quill Iconset
description:
Quill is a 120+ iconset for your next email project.


These icons were originally supposed to be a re-design of the iconset for Tempo, the mindful email client for Mac.


Sadly, the company came to a sudden closure, and we never got to implement the icons. Thatâ€™s why we've decided to give them away for free.


If you know how to code, you might want to check the Quill Github Repo, so you can include the latest icons via NPM package.


We hope you enjoy using these icons for your future projects.


Casper & team Tempo
